#Making a graph

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(x= body_mass_g, y= flipper_length_mm))+
  geom_point(aes(color=species))+
  scale_color_manual(values = c("purple", "darkorange", "forestgreen"))+
  labs(x= "Body Mass (G)",
       y= "Flipper Length (mm)",
       title = "Palmers Penguin Graph", 
       subtitle = "Palmer Archipeligo (2007-2009", 
       caption = "Collected by Dr. Kristen Gorman and colleagues at Palmer Station LTER",
       legend= "Species")+
  facet_wrap(~island)+
  theme_minimal()
  
```
